link.script: window.setTimeout(function () { document.title = "Home - Cooper County R-4 School District"; }, 500);

br.p: Bunceton School closure has been extended until May 4, 2020. Distance learning and meal deliveries will continue as currently scheduled. Remember there are drop boxes for homework available on Tuesdays and Wednesdays from 8 - 3 p.m. at the front door. Click here for the full document.

If you need to drop off student work for teachers the front door will be open on Tuesdays and Wednesdays from 8-3. The boxes are labeled for each teacher. Please make sure the name of the student is on the packet and in the correct box! Teachers will be receiving deposited papers on Fridays. There is no other access to the building allowed. Please email your child's teacher if you need more info or have questions about anything.
A Google list of teacher plans for students at Bunceton School.
Free websites for online learning at home
There are no reported cases of the Coronavirus in our district at this time. A letter is attached explaining the district's approach to controlling influenza and the Coronavirus if necessary.

div.span: 500 East Main Street | Bunceton, MO 65237 | Phone 660-427-5415
